featured.text: She was a U.S. delegate to the United Nations in 1958 and won the UN peace prize in 1977.

definition.zh_def: 和平，指沒有戰爭或衝突的狀態，通常與安寧和安靜相關。
definition.en_def: A state of tranquility or quietness; freedom from disturbance or conflict.
definition.example: The two countries signed a treaty to ensure lasting peace.
